original_text: So make your father and your mother proud of you. Do things that will make your mother happy.
korean_text: 네 부모를 즐겁게 하며 너를 낳은 어미를 기쁘게 하라

sentences.original_text: So make your father and your mother proud of you
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 너의 아버지와 어머니를 자랑스럽게 하라

sentences.original_text: Do things that will make your mother happy
